entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.6°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming east 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
